Reviews.Title: Im not a apple head, i love android but..
Reviews.Author: Chidinma
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical at first about buying this phone from amazon because i got it at the price $499 (brand new!! Sealed) but i couldn't be happier! The phone of course is running ios 7 straight from the box and the touch i.d is probably the best thing ever. If you're debating whether to get the 5c or 5s definitely spend a little more for the 5s its totally worth it. The camera is great. Extremely fast and extremely clear. There are new options on it like the slomo effect which is fun to play with. The dual tone flash takes mobile picture taking to a whole other level. The best camera on a phone in the market. Take that from someone who has had a galaxy note 2 and samsung galaxy s3. The screen size is something people might not want to over look. If you have extremely big hands i would say go in store and try it out, see how well you can operate it. But its definitely "one handable" meaning you can use it with only one hand and not ever have to over stretch. The resolution is crystal clear, no doubt about that. Although the phone is 1.2 ghz it is blazing fast. It is a 64 bit. I can play heavy games like GTA and not ever freeze on me, even with lots of apps running in the background. Battery life is as expected when dealing with apple. But one thing i have noticed standby times are incredibly great. I can go to sleep with my phone at 100% and wake up and its at 99% sometimes still 100%. This phone is not "droppable" you'll have lucky moments when you drop it and it doesn't shatter but if it falls too high and too hard or at the wrong angle, your screen will be gone. Though I've had mine for over a month I haven't cracked it because i always keep it in a case. So invest in something protective like a speck case or otterbox or some generics.

Reviews.Title: This seller is a liar and a thief
Reviews.Author: hamid
Reviews.Content: This person selling this item is a liar .. I asked specifically if this unit is for t mobile. The sell told me yes.. I put a tmobile SIM card in this phone that was sent to me but it did not read because the Carrier was sent to sprint

Reviews.Title: Fraudulent phone
Reviews.Author: josh
Reviews.Content: After having the phone for about 2 days, it was blocked from T-mobiles network for "fraud."  The T-mobile rep advised that it was likely purchased on an upgrade and never paid for and that the only way to get the phone off the block list was to have the original owner pay thier bill.  Since we bought it NEW in the UNOPENED box from an Amazon vendor, we thought we were safe.  Luckily, Amazon customer service is great and after returning the phone they issued a full refund.

Reviews.Title: Don't do it
Reviews.Author: Aaron andrade
Reviews.Content: Not for American use. Japanese tmobile. Not the right model. Took forever to get it, send it back, and get my refund.

Reviews.Title: Excellent !
Reviews.Author: MARCUS VINICIUS LOPES SALLES "MARCUS SALLES"
Reviews.Content: I bought this Iphone 5S for my wife. This is her first experience with iphone and she is very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: SCAM!
Reviews.Author: Vishal Chheda
Reviews.Content: Sold me an unpaid/stolen phone that was blocked from T-Mobile!The Seller was not cooperative and said he bought the phone in bulk from someone else but is locked to T-Mobile. I didn't know that it would be completely locked from T-mobile, and you cannot unlock the phone as you are not the original purchaser!Do not buy it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent customer service and price
Reviews.Author: Khalid Ettaleb
Reviews.Content: Excellent guy. He has a good customer service. I bought from him an IPhone 5S with a good price. It works very good. I likes it.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Merrick300
Reviews.Content: i really like the iphone 5s, i can reach everything on the screen with my thumb. I am wondering about the future of Apple since the death of Steve Jobs though. They are involved with Dr Dre now and I heard they are going to make bigger phones, something Steve Jobs was against. Guess we will see.

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Lewis
Reviews.Content: The only think I don't like you send me the Cheapest usb cord n no earpod other than that everything look good n perfect

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: mohammed
Reviews.Content: there is some crutch on the front of the phone  . but its work good and i will keep it

Reviews.Title: Definitely would buy from this company again
Reviews.Author: Cassie
Reviews.Content: Great customer service! I love my new phone! And the best part is I got it from a really good price! Other places were charging me almost 1,000 for this phone but I got it here for 600. I'm very pleased. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Good with a glitch
Reviews.Author: jcorrales
Reviews.Content: This is a very good iphone model. There is a problem that hopefully gets resolved later. If you accidentally push the bottom center button to long, it goes into voice over mode that is difficult to get out of!

Reviews.Title: Great phone to have in our System.
Reviews.Author: Parag
Reviews.Content: Great Phone!!! Great phone to have in our system. This phone is also feel like is one of our part in our body system. I really enjoy this phone. Without this phone I feel like handicapped.
